original_title: No Pork on the Fork: A Kosher BBQ Story
overview: This film describes the unique Jewish culture in Atlanta, where the annual Kosher BBQ Festival takes place. And no, this is not an oxymoron. Director Adam Hirsch, one of this Festivalâ€™s organizers, looks behind the scenes of this curious event, observes the lives of people who try to combine the traditional Jewish culture with that of the American South.
title: No Pork on the Fork: A Kosher BBQ Story
